attributes.action: Stop the development of Sutton Community Academy, On Sutton Lawn Pleasure Grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is proposed that a new academy be established to replace sutton centre community college from September 2010, This has been proposed to be built on a public, and well used park in the heart of a very built up community, Ashfield people have rasied concerns, and it would seem that nottingham city council have delayed informing ashfield taxpayers of the plans. Many people are still unaware that there open green space will soon no longer be available.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
